content.raw:
Ok, take a look at commit e82ec5e*, according to my experiments, this places the effort needed to turn the valve between 3 and 4.5 times the one needed to turn the satellite.

It's worth mentioning that the satellite doesn't have damping, so the lower friction here compensates for the damping introduced in order to make the valve stabilize quickly.

\* when I say satellite, I mean door
content.html:
Ok, take a look at commit e82ec5e*, according to my experiments, this places the effort needed to turn the valve between 3 and 4.5 times the one needed to turn the satellite.

It's worth mentioning that the satellite doesn't have damping, so the lower friction here compensates for the damping introduced in order to make the valve stabilize quickly.

* when I say satellite, I mean door
